attributes.action: Put a high wooden fence along the A303 at Stonehenge to stop people rubber-necking causing delays and accidents.
attributes.additional_details: Everyday there are queues over a mile long at Stonehenge due to people slowing down to have a "look". On order for the traffic to flow on this part of the A303 only 2 solutions appear, 1 make the road a dual carriageway (but due to the area being of English Heritage this is hard to come by), or 2 place a high fence (wooden or paneled in order to be opaque) along the A303 to stop people from dangerously driving, slowing and causing queues for other travellers.  Therefore I propose they build a fence to increase the flow of traffic and the safety of travellers.
